sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there are only two dwarfs jousting. They ride live animals, a dog and a sow. Joffrey, however, is mentioned in two songs: Hamish the Harper's ''Lord Renly's Ride'' and another song by Galyeon of Cuy praising Joffrey for his bravery in the [[Battle of the Blackwater]].
sections.Biography:
===Background===
A [[Dwarfism|dwarf]], he makes a living by performing for other peoples' amusement.

===[[Season 4]]===
Along with a group of other dwarfs, he takes part in a mock "reenactment" of the [[War of the Five Kings]] at [[Purple Wedding|King Joffrey's wedding]]. He dresses as [[Joffrey Baratheon]] and rides a gold lion with antlers representing [[House Baratheon of King's Landing]]. He emerges victorious.<ref>"[[The Lion and the Rose]]"</ref>
